entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow or rain beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
